DOC.brief_summary: Obstetric fistula , also call vaginal fistula , serious medical condition affect woman low income country . Despite strengthen research fistula , little data follow-up fistula repair . The objective study analyse factor associate recurrence fistula outcomes pregnancy follow fistula repair Guinea . It target woman get closed fistula discharge repair 2012/2015 three fistula repair site support Fistula Care Project Guinea ( Kissidougou Prefectoral Hospital , Labé Regional Hospital Jean Paul II Hospital Conakry ) . The outcomes interest fistula recurrence pregnancy . The predictor interest include patient characteristic , fistula characteristic , context repair context reintegration . Participants give informed consent home visit Fistula Counsellors manage woman surgery interview enrolment every six month inclusion . The study duration estimate 48 month ( January 2012 March 2016 ) include retrospective part . A sample size 364 woman estimate recurrence fistula plus/minus 2 % margin error ( width confidence interval 4 % ) 95 % confidence interval sufficient estimate rate pregnancy two-sided 95 % confidence interval 10 % precision . The cumulative incidence rate fistula recurrence calculate use Kaplan-Meier method risk factor analysis perform use adjust cox regression . For outcomes pregnancy , Pearson 's Chi Square ( χ2 ) use compare proportion pregnancy outcomes potential predictor logistic regression model use association report risk ratio 95 % confidence interval . Analysis do use STATA version 13 ( STATA Corporation , College Station , TX , USA ) level significance set P < 0.05 .
DOC.brief_title: Recurrence Pregnancy Post-repair Obstetric Fistula Guinea
DOC.criteria: In order eligible , study participant must meet following criterion : Had fistula close discharge , measure dye test ( include woman dry residual incontinence ) ; Willing able provide write informed consent ( assent minor ) ; Had urinary rectovaginal fistula ; Agree participate followup visit ( every six month ) consent date duration study ; Agree stay Guinea duration study . Potential participant meet follow criterion enrol study : Refusal give free informed consent ; Surgery do outside study site ; Incomplete medical record ; Incontinence unrelated urinary rectovaginal fistula .
